ISSUE.TITLE: [DS-388] Item importer - new option to enable workflow notification emails
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION:
Imported from JIRA [DS-388] created by stuartlewis

When importing items using the item importer, no notification emails are sent if importing with the -w 'workflow' option.

BUGGYCOMMIT.MESSAGE: Merged in task/main-cris/DSC-2276 (pull request #3695) [DSC-2276] fix store-metrics to commit every 20 worked items Approved-by: Vincenzo Mecca

COMMIT.MESSAGE: Merged in task/main-cris/DSC-2226 (pull request #3762) [DSC-2226] optimize SQL queries for metadata enhancement updates Approved-by: Vincenzo Mecca
